summary: Phase 2 features testing completed successfully. All backend APIs (Orders, Disputes, Analytics, Audit Logs) are functional. Frontend admin dashboard pages load correctly with proper Arabic RTL layout. Admin login works with provided credentials.
passed_tests: Admin login with admin@gamelo.com / Test123! - SUCCESS
GET /api/admin/orders/advanced - Returns orders with pagination (200 OK)
GET /api/admin/orders - Basic orders endpoint works (200 OK)
GET /api/admin/analytics/overview - Returns revenue stats, user stats, top products (200 OK)
GET /api/admin/disputes - Returns disputes list or empty array (200 OK)
GET /api/admin/audit-logs - Returns logs with pagination (200 OK)
Unauthorized access to all admin endpoints returns 401
Orders Management page (/admin/orders) - Displays orders with filters and status badges
Orders Edit dialog - Opens correctly with status dropdown and notes field
Analytics Dashboard (/admin/analytics) - Displays revenue stats, user stats, top products
Disputes Management (/admin/disputes) - Displays empty state correctly
Audit Logs (/admin/audit) - Displays empty state correctly

success_rate.frontend: 100% (All Phase 2 pages load and function correctly)

seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Existing data used for testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 2 features (Orders Management, Disputes, Analytics, Audit Logs) are fully implemented and working. All API endpoints return correct data structures. Frontend pages display data correctly with Arabic RTL layout. The admin dashboard shows: 5 users, 2 orders, 60 products, 85.98 JOD revenue. Top products include PUBG Mobile 660 UC (3400 sales), Xbox Game Pass Ultimate (2340 sales), PlayStation Plus 12 months (1252 sales). No disputes or audit logs exist yet as no admin actions have been performed.
